column4: Hi everyone, I'm trying to get my internet to work on an asus p5b deluxe.  Both eth0 and eth1 don't seem to work, although network manger claims both are "connected".  I cannot 'ping www.google.com'.  Not sure how to further troubleshoot this... any suggestions?
can you ping your own internal cable modem router?
is there a standard ip for me to try?  Also please note that I have to disconnect here to try the other computer since I don't have a router
see dyrne's post above. type "route -n" to see your router IP
